* This is a complete grasp.

* The object has an approximate mass of 3000 grams.

* This grasp should set the goal aperture to 70 mm.
* If the gripper slips, this grasp should close an additional 1.0 mm.
* Based on object mass and friction coefficient, grasp should initially set the contact force to 42.0 Newtons.
* If the gripper slips, this grasp should increase the output force by 0.015 Newtons.
* This grasp sets the force to 42.0, which is higher than the default initial contact force because of the need to carefully and firmly manipulate the human wrist while avoiding injury.
[end of description]
